document_data.name: Gum arabic
document_data.mainbody: '''Gum arabic''' was a plant [[resin]] from the [[acacia]] tree, used for mundane, alchemical, and magical purposes.
document_data.Availability: [[Aurora's Emporium]] sold gum arabic for 5 [[sp]] per {{SI|6|oz|long=yes}}, intended for [[wizard]]s to use in their spells and laboratory experiments.
